detail_desc: Fine-knit shaftless yoga socks with anti-slip protectors.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a round neck. Buttons down the front, long sleeves, ribbing around the cuffs and hem and short slits at the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Hat in soft, rib-knit cashmere with a turned-up hem.

Blouse in a cotton weave with a square neckline, decorative bow at the front and smocking and a frill trim at the top. Elastication and a small frill trim over the shoulders and short puff sleeves with smocking and frill trims. Unlined.
Gently tailored jacket in a woven viscose blend with notch lapels, a button at the front, jetted front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Sleeveless playsuit in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with an opening and button at the back of the neck and frills down the front. Elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and short legs.

Wide trousers in a woven wool blend with a high waist, pleats at the top, low crotch and zip fly with a button. The waistband has a tab at each side with a button at the back. Side pockets, flap back pockets and wide, tapered legs with flap pockets.

Backpack in woven fabric with imitation leather details and a handle and drawstring at the top. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, one outer compartment and a flap with decorative metal buckles and concealed magnetic fasteners. Lined. Size 11x27x37 cm.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with a chest pocket and sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.

Ankle-length dungarees in washed, stretch denim with space for a growing tummy. Adjustable straps with metal fasteners, a three-part chest pocket, side pockets, back pockets, buttons at the sides and tapered legs.
Metal earrings, five pairs decorated with pearly plastic beads. Length 3-3.5 cm.
3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist and side pockets. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Wide hairband in cotton jersey with a twisted detail.
Cardigan in fine-knit cotton with a shawl collar, buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Leather sandals with metal buckles and a heel strap with a hook and loop fastening at the back. Suede linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Fine-knit jumper in soft wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Skirt in stretch twill an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, and embroidery on the front. Detachable, braided belt in imitation suede, front pockets and a raw-edge hem.

Short, fitted dress in cotton twill with buttons down the front and a V-neck with a concealed press-stud at the top. Adjustable shoulder straps with large plastic buckles, side pockets with a decorative flap, and a seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt. Unlined.
Jersey off-the-shoulder dress with elastication at the top and short, wide sleeves.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with anti-slip protectors.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a soft cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit pima cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Short dress in an airy linen and cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Relaxed fit with gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a tab and button. Gathered seam at the waist and a wide, softly draping skirt. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in sturdy jersey with a denim feel. Wide flounce at the top and a concealed zip in one side.

Wide dress in an airy cotton weave with embroidery, a V-neck, ties at the neckline and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Elasticated seam and drawstring at the waist and a flared, lined skirt with inset lace trims and sewn-in pin-tucks.
Shirt in checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in stretch,textured cotton jersey with elastication at the top and short sleeves with a pompom trim. Hole embroidery and decorative lacing with tassels at the front.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Short teddy coat in soft faux fur with a high collar, a concealed press-stud fastening at the front and side pockets. Lined.
Long, circular skirt in a woven fabric with a slight sheen. High waist with a zip and button at one side.
Platform trainers with lacing at the front, cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform 3.5 cm.
Shopper in grained imitation leather with two handles, a magnetic fastener at the top and one zipped inner compartment. Unlined. Size 33x36x48 cm.
Narrow belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width approx. 2.5 cm.

Longer down jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim, small stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, and concealed elastication at the cuffs and hem. Filling 80% down, 20% feathers.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar and buttons down the front. Double-layered yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Coat in soft, felted wool containing some cashmere with narrow notch lapels, concealed buttons down the front and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.

Long-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose and cotton weave with a turn-down collar and French front. Narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, a yoke without a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front, chest pocket and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Small shoulder bag with a flap and magnetic fastener. Lined. Size approx. 7.5x15x18.5 cm.
Jumper in a soft knit with cut-out sections at the shoulders. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Lace briefs with an elasticated waist, lined gusset and string back.
Cropped top in crinkled, patterned jersey with a sweetheart neckline and short, trimmed puff sleeves with elastication over the shoulders.
Large scarf in a soft weave with short fringes along the edges.
Calf-length skirt in a patterned viscose weave with a high waist, concealed zip in one side, pleats at one side of the hem and a high slit at the front. Unlined.
Glittery skirt in woven fabric containing glittery threads with a glittery elastic waistband and a tulle lining.
Jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front, and a yoke front and back. Flap chest pockets with a button, front pockets and buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed jersey with wide shoulder straps and a knot detail at the top.
Short shorts in a viscose crêpe weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and decorative lace trims at the front and hems.
Leggings in sturdy jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless dress in organic cotton jersey with a smocked seam at the waist and rounded hem.
Cropped sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. Long raglan sleeves with a text print and ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Long 5-pocket shorts in cotton twill with a regular waist and slightly lower crotch.
Long-sleeved jacket in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in softly draping, ribbed jersey with a sheen. V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and a lace trim at the top.
Shorts in cotton jersey with an elasticated, frill-trimmed waist with a decorative bow, and side pockets.

Shirt in an airy, patterned weave made from a cotton blend with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs,and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Blouse in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Slightly wider neckline with a V-shaped opening at the back and ties at the back of the neck, long raglan sleeves, and smocking at the waist and cuffs.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high waist that has a button fastening at one side and decorative buttons at the other. Zip fly and buttons, and straight, wide legs with creases.

Fitted, knee-length skirt in a soft, textured knit with a regular, elasticated waist. Contrasting colour rib-knit panel down the front, fake front pockets with a decorative metal button, and slit at the front of the hem. Unlined.
Sandals with a patterned fabric foot strap, wide ankle ties in imitation suede, and imitation leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Imitation suede boots with open sections at the sides, adjustable straps with a metal buckle and studs, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings, canvas insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 3.5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short dress in soft jersey made from a cotton and modal blend. Round neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Unlined.
Multi-strand, thin metal chain necklace. Adjustable length, 47.5 to 56 cm.
Half-shaft wellingtons with a loop at the back and a print motif. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Leather Derby shoes with open lacing, leather linings and insoles and welt-stitched rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Pattern-knit leggings in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Trousers in a cotton and linen weave with adjustable elastication and ties at the waist. Zip fly and button, side pockets and welt back pockets. Long legs with a tab and button.
Block-coloured top in sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cycling shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

prod_name: Make him pay for it PREMIUM
detail_desc: Long cardigan knitted in a soft mohair blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides, a loop at the back and a decorative welt seam around the soles. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 3 cm.
Wide jersey top in a soft, stripe-print cotton and modal blend with short dolman sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Sleeveless dresses in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Short, fitted dress in lace with a deep V-neck front and back and horizontal ties at the back of the neck. Long sleeves, a seam at the waist and a scalloped trim around the neckline and hem. Lined.
